      • hasInternetConnection

        public static boolean hasInternetConnection(Context context)
        Checks if the app has connectivity to the Internet
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        true if has connection to the Internet and false if it doesn't

      • HTTPGetRequest

        public static java.lang.String HTTPGetRequest(java.lang.String url)
        Does a GET request to a given url Note: Please use this method on an AsyncTask in order not to freeze the application unnecessarely (http://developer.android.com/guide/practices/responsiveness.html)
        Parameters:
        url - given url
        Returns:
        the string output of the GET request or null if something went wrong

      • changeWirelessState

        public static boolean changeWirelessState(Context context,
                          boolean state)
        Set wireless connectivity On, also this method will need the permissions "android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE" and "android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE"
        Parameters:
        context - - application context
        state - - set enable or disable wireless connection
        Returns:
        true if was set successfully and false if it wasn't

      • checkServerConnection

        public static boolean checkServerConnection(java.net.URL u)
        Check if can connect to the server, also this method will need the permissions "android.permission.INTERNET"
        Parameters:
        u - - server url
        Returns:
        true if the connection returned a successful code
